snippet: Heidi Latsky’s “Gimp,” featuring several disabled dancers, challenges preconceptions about beauty and body image.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews performance of Heidi Latsky dance piece Gimp, featuring several disabled dancers, as part of the Lincoln Center Out of Doors Festival.
lead_paragraph: Heidi Latsky’s “Gimp,” featuring several disabled dancers, challenges preconceptions about beauty and body image.

headline.seo: Heidi Latsky Dance Performs ‘Gimp’ at Lincoln Center
headline.main: Sailing Into a Summer Night on the Wings of Beauty
headline.print_headline: Sailing Into a Summer Night on the Wings of Beauty
